column5: What can I say other than that I would recommend any one who would ever consider a Musky trip that they try it at least once in their life. I'm going back GUARANTEED!!!! Great set up! Well taken care of. The fish co operated and both me and my buddy caught fish. Was a trip to put in the books that's for sure. I learned more in 2 days than I have in 35 years fishing on the bay. There are differences but what I learned will DEFINITELY put more fish in my boat this season. Out tomorrow to try new found knowledge. I had a blast as did my buddy who has never caught a Musky or thought much about Musky fishing in general......... He's sold!  Thanks Marc !!!!!  Was a pleasure....Your new 08 calendar is in the mail with dates marked down on it ..ha ha  ...
Looks like I have a good chance to be there at the end of this month.......man, its going to be awesome!!! gb, you got me PUMPED!!!
Yeh, what is up with that no pics  . Still sounds like you had a great time, but we want pics, we like pics.
Yup, Marc is a class act like many other OFNCers.    I've been only once out with him but I wouldn't hesitate to recommend him if your in his neck of the woods.
maybe if I start saving my pennies now I could afford to go with him next year...oh wait you have to book a year in advance.so that would be in 2 years........he is the man for muskie
Start saving!! Well worth the wait!!
you're right it is I just said that hoping someone who has booked with him would feel sorry for me and offer me a spot in the boat....LOL....just kidding  but...well...LOL
I can't guarantee anything but if you would like to come out for a day with Brian on Georgian bay. Your welcome to.
You will be there Dano !  Glad you had a good time Andy!  ....23 more days!   UMMMM , sorry Terry...You've got to stand up taller when you wave your arm! LOL
